nodes.text: Drilling Platform Dopa was a mining platform attached to the northern side of the Cartel mining mesa on the planet Makeb. One of six mining platforms attached to the mesa by the Hutt Cartel, the platform used a mining laser to drill into the planet's core for isotope-5. During the conflict, Sith Empire forces attacked the platform and commandeered it in order to halt the planet's impending destruction.

Drilling Platform Dopa was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic along with the rest of the planet Makeb in the 2013 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
